main event: Multiple sightings of luminous objects rapidly ascending and descending in Russia between November 1952 and February 1953.
interesting points: On one occasion, an object was observed ascending into the air and surrounded by several light beams directed vertically upward.
A cigar-shaped object was observed ascending in the sky pursuing its course.
The luminous objects appeared to change shape and color from round to cigar-shaped, and their light changed from red to green during observation.
Many of the sightings were believed to be the result of Soviet balloon activity, and some maneuvers were attributed to meteor showers.
Some of the objects remained in one spot for a period of time and exhibited unusual behavior such as rapid ascent and descent.
sighted object: luminous objects rapidly ascending and descending
photographs: no photographs available in the report
